member.name: T:System.Runtime.Analyzers.BasicTestForEmptyStringsUsingStringLengthAnalyzer
member.summary:
CA1820: Test for empty strings using string length.
Comparing strings using the property or the method is significantly faster than using . This is because Equals executes significantly more MSIL instructions than either IsNullOrEmpty or the number of instructions executed to retrieve the Length property value and compare it to zero.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Analyzers.BasicDoNotLockOnObjectsWithWeakIdentity
member.summary: CA2002: Do not lock on objects with weak identities
